title: July 27, 20103PM
content:
Today’s guest is Tom Englehardt and he is the nation’s most important writers and commentators on America’s military... <!--more--> adventures and their impact upon our culture and economy.
He is founder of the Nation Institutes progressive blog, Tomsdispatch.
com, and is a co-founder with Steve Frazer of the American Empire Project - a publishing endeavor to investigate the adverse effects America’s imperial efforts have had on democracy, which includes notable individuals such as Noam Chomsky, Chalmers Johnson, and Michael Klare.
